00027 #include "kvi_settings.h"
00028 
00029 
00030 // Data type: QString
00031 // Default: QString()
00032 #define KVS_PT_STRING 0
00033 
00034 // Data type: QString
00035 // Default: QString()
00036 #define KVS_PT_NONEMPTYSTRING 1
00037 
00038 // Data type: kvs_int_t
00039 // Default: 0
00040 #define KVS_PT_INT 2
00041         #define KVS_PT_INTEGER 2
00042 
00043 // Data type: kvs_uint_t
00044 // Default: 0
00045 #define KVS_PT_UINT 3
00046         #define KVS_PT_UNSIGNEDINTEGER 3
00047 
00048 // Data type: kvs_real_t
00049 // default: 0.0
00050 #define KVS_PT_DOUBLE 4
00051         #define KVS_PT_REAL 4
00052 
00053 // Data type: bool
00054 // default: false
00055 #define KVS_PT_BOOL 5
00056         #define KVS_PT_BOOLEAN 5
00057 
00058 // Data type: KviKvsHash *
00059 // default: 0
00060 #define KVS_PT_HASH 6
00061 
00062 // Data type: KviKvsArrayCast
00063 // default empty cast
00064 #define KVS_PT_ARRAYCAST 7
00065 
00066 // Data type: KviKvsVariant *
00067 // default: 0
00068 #define KVS_PT_VARIANT 8
00069 
00070 // Data type: QCString
00071 // default null string (0)
00072 #define KVS_PT_CSTRING 9
00073 
00074 // Data type: QCString
00075 // default null string (0)
00076 #define KVS_PT_NONEMPTYCSTRING 10
00077 
00078 // Data type: QStringList
00079 // default: list cleared
00080 // This eats all the remaining params in the list!
00081 #define KVS_PT_STRINGLIST 11
00082 
00083 // Data type: KviKvsVariantList
00084 // default: list cleared
00085 // This eats all the remaining params in the list!
00086 // The list has autodelete set to off since the copies are SHALLOW!
00087 #define KVS_PT_VARIANTLIST 12
00088 
00089 // Data type: kvs_hobjec_t
00090 // default: (kvs_hobject_t)0
00091 #define KVS_PT_HOBJECT 13
00092 
00093 // Data type: KviKvsArray *
00094 // default 0
00095 #define KVS_PT_ARRAY 14
00096 
00097 // Data type: ignored
00098 #define KVS_PT_IGNORE 15
00099 
00100 // If omitted, set to default
00101 #define KVS_PF_OPTIONAL 1
00102 // Valid only for string types: it's the last parameter that eats all the remaining ones
00103 #define KVS_PF_APPENDREMAINING 2
00104 
00105 class KviKvsVariantList;
00106 class KviKvsRunTimeContext;
00107 
00108 namespace KviKvsParameterProcessor
00109 {
00110         class KVIRC_API ParameterFormat
00111         {
00112         public:
00113                 const char          * szName;
00114                 const unsigned char   uType;
00115                 const unsigned char   uFlags;
00116                 void                * pContainer;
00117         public:
00118                 ParameterFormat(const char * n,const unsigned char t,const unsigned char f,void * p)
00119                 : szName(n), uType(t), uFlags(f), pContainer(p) {};
00120         };
00121 
00122         KVIRC_API bool process(KviKvsVariantList * pVariantList,KviKvsRunTimeContext * pContext,KviKvsParameterProcessor::ParameterFormat * pFmtArray);
00123 }

00126 #define KVS_PARAMETERS_BEGIN(__name) \
00127                 KviKvsParameterProcessor::ParameterFormat __name[] = \
00128                 {
00129 
00130 #define KVS_PARAMETERS_END \
00131                         KviKvsParameterProcessor::ParameterFormat(0,0,0,0) \
00132                 };
00133 
00134 #define KVS_PARAMETER(__name,__type,__flags,__void) \
00135                         KviKvsParameterProcessor::ParameterFormat(__name,__type,__flags,((void *)(&(__void)))),
00136 
00137 #define KVS_PARAMETER_IGNORED(__name) \
00138                         KviKvsParameterProcessor::ParameterFormat(__name,KVS_PT_IGNORE,0,0),
